create.title: Create Enterprise
create.description: Create a new enterprise to manage your business
create.name: Enterprise Name
create.intro: You already have an account in the system. To continue, please register your business so we can assign the appropriate permissions.
create.roleInstruction: Depending on the type of business you register, the system will assign you a corresponding role:
create.callToAction: Start by registering your business information to unlock the full features of the system.

role.buildingOwnerDesc: Manage the entire building, monitor greenhouse gas emissions, devices, and energy performance.
role.tenantDesc: Monitor and manage activities, devices, and energy usage in your rented area.
role.buildingOwnerDescription: Manages one or more buildings and can invite tenants to join and manage groups.
role.tenantDescription: Becomes a tenant and can join a building by invitation. Has access to assigned groups.

packageCredit.title: Credit Package
packageCredit.description: Credit packages are administrator-created configuration packages that allow businesses to purchase credits at optional prices and discounts, for use on premium services on the platform.

ratio.description: The conversion rate configuration determines the number of credits required per subscription month and per device, which serves as the basis for all credit transactions.
ratio.title: RATIO

emissionSource.name: Emission source

upload.title: Import multiple records via Excel file

fuel.description: Manage standard fuel conversion factors to accurately calculate greenhouse gas emissions from energy consumption.

emissionFactor.description1: Manage standard emission factors for CO2, CH4, N2O to accurately calculate carbon from different sources.

chemicalDensity.description: Manage standard chemical densities to convert between mass and volume, supporting emission calculations.

account.description: View and manage all registered user accounts in the system, including user roles and permissions

enterprise.description: View and manage enterprise accounts, monitor building registrations and tenant relationships

tenant.description: View and manage tenant profiles and their building group memberships across enterprises

carousel.title: Your Gateway to Sustainable Business
carousel.description: Streamline Your Sustainability Initiatives with Unprecedented Transparency, Security, and Data Integrity.

intro.title: Getting Started with Green Building
intro.description: Begin your journey towards efficient carbon management and sustainability with Green Building. Our platform is designed to make it easy for you to calculate, monitor, and disclose your company's carbon footprint.
intro.item1: Access your personalized dashboard to view your progress
intro.item3: Showcase your commitment to a greener future

item1.title: Visualize and calculate
item1.detail: Visualize and calculate your company's carbon footprint and sustainability performance.

item2.title: Set, track, and achieve
item2.detail: Set, track, and achieve ambitious sustainability goals.

item3.title: Manage and disclose
item3.detail: Manage and disclose your carbon credits with transparency and security.

item4.title: Share your sustainability story
item4.detail: Share your sustainability story with your audience through personalized dashboard links.

testimonials.title: Testimonial
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by Leading Companies
testimonials.description: GreenBuilding is proud to be the carbon management platform of choice for numerous forward-thinking companies across various industries. Our clients rely on GreenBuilding to streamline their sustainability initiatives and demonstrate their commitment to a greener future. Some of our valued customers include: "companies that are already using the platform"

item1.title: Skyline Properties
item1.description: Skyline Properties is a real estate company focused on sustainability. They use GreenBuilding to monitor and reduce their carbon footprint.
item1.author: Property Director, Skyline Properties

item2.title: Tech Innovations Inc.
item2.description: Tech Innovations Inc. is a technology company focused on sustainability. They use GreenBuilding to monitor and reduce their carbon footprint.
item2.author: Sustainability Manager, Tech Innovations Inc.

reason.subtitle: Carbon Clarity
reason.title: Why Choose GreenBuilding
reason.description: The GreenBuilding platform combines the power of Power BI to offer a comprehensive carbon management solution that provides paralleled transparency and data security. By using GreenBuilding, you can:

item1.title: Accurately calculate
item1.description: Accurately calculate and disclose your GHG emissions for regulatory compliance.

item2.title: Build trust and credibility
item2.description: Build trust and credibility with customers, investors, and partners.

item3.title: Enhance your company's brand
item3.description: Enhance your company's brand image and attract eco-conscious stakeholders.

item4.title: Foster a culture
item4.description: Foster a culture of sustainability within your orzanization.

features.title: Features
features.description: Our platform provides powerful tools for both building owners and tenants to monitor, analyze, and reduce carbon emissions.

buildingManagement.title: Building Management
buildingManagement.description: Centralized dashboard for property managers to monitor entire building performance and set sustainability goals.

realTimeAnalytics.title: Real-time Analytics
realTimeAnalytics.description: Track emissions data in real-time with detailed analytics and customizable reporting for regulatory compliance.

tenantPortal.title: Tenant Portal
tenantPortal.description: Dedicated interfaces for tenants to monitor their space's usage and contribute to building-wide sustainability efforts.

footer.detailSupport: Our dedicated customer support team is here to help you make the most of the GreenBuilding platform. Whether you need assistance with account setup, carbon calculation, or dashboard customization, we're just a click away. Contact us for any inquiries or guidance you may need.
footer.slogan: Empowering sustainable buildings through emissions tracking and reduction.

creditTerms.term1: By using the top-up service to receive credits, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
creditTerms.term2: Conversion rate: 1,000 VND = 1 Credit (unless promotions apply).
creditTerms.term3: Credits are non-refundable, non-exchangeable for cash, and non-transferable.
creditTerms.term4: All top-up transactions are non-refundable unless due to system error.
creditTerms.termNotice: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time without prior notice.
creditTerms.aboutContentTitle: Introduction to Credit and deposit methods
creditTerms.aboutContent: You can top up your account to receive credits for using our services. Multiple payment methods are supported, including MoMo, VNPAY, Visa/MasterCard, etc.

powerBiGuide.title: Power Bi User Guide
powerBiGuide.title1: 1. Generate Access Token to get data from Power BI to website
powerBiGuide.step1: Select the Power BI Access Token item in the menu.
powerBiGuide.step3: Fill in Token Name, Expiration and select Scope
powerBiGuide.step4: Then click "Generate token" to create access token or "Cancel" to cancel
powerBiGuide.step5: After the token is successfully created, the access token will appear.
powerBiGuide.note1: Enterprise can delete the token if they don't use it and can generate a new one.
powerBiGuide.note2: Then the enterprise accesses the link: https://greenbuildings.cloud/power-bi/apiKey/**
powerBiGuide.withApiKey: With apiKey being the token that the enterprise just generated
powerBiGuide.enterpriseAccess: Enterprise access this link to Power BI Desktop by selecting Home > Get Data > Web.
powerBiGuide.dataNote: Data will be fetched from the website to power BI and enterprise can edit the information fields as well as the charts they want.
powerBiGuide.title2: 2. Generate Dashboard in Power BI in website
powerBiGuide.step6: Business access to Power BI service: https://app.powerbi.com
powerBiGuide.step7: Enterprise log in to Power BI service using Power BI Desktop account
powerBiGuide.step8: Enterprise select File > Embed report > Website or portal.
powerBiGuide.step9: The Power BI system will provide enterprise with a iframe HTML code.
powerBiGuide.step11: Select the Dashboard category in the menu
powerBiGuide.step12: Enterprise copies the iframe just obtained from Power BI Service and puts it into GreenBuildings
powerBiGuide.step13: Then, the user click "Submit" button and the Dashboard will be created]
powerBiGuide.note3: Note: When the user makes any changes to the data, the Dashboard will also change according to the data.
